austin.description: On President's Day, Austin, Dean and Felix played tourists in San Francisco. They rode cable cars and checked out the sea lions at Fisherman's Wharf.
austin.title: Austin

birthday1.description:
Lucie's birthday was February 20.

The previous week, Dean took Felix gift shopping. Felix was very sure that mom wanted "something pretty and colorful". He selected a pink My Little Pony, named Sweetberry. Felix explains: "her name is Sweetberry because she is sweet; not sweet to eat, sweet to love."

Lucie is very fond of her present.
birthday1.title: Birthday 1

birthday2.description:
We had another birthday party this week: Baby Dog turned 2. For a while now, Felix insisted that Baby Dog's birthday was soon after Mom's.

All his doggie pals showed up. From left to right: Olga, Spicey, Baby Dog, Oscar and Spike.
birthday2.title: Birthday 2

birthday3.description: Felix helped Baby Dog blow his candles and open his present (a little booklet of dog stickers).
birthday3.title: Birthday 3

milo1.description: Milo hasn't gotten tired of peekaboo.  Not in picture:  Dean leaping into the room.
milo1.title: Milo 1

river1.description: We discovered a new great weekend hangout: Strawberry Creek Park. Is has a babbling brook, a playground, a big field, and a cafe with yummy food.   It's just a few minutes by car from our house.
river1.title: River 1

river2.description: Milo is way, way into throwing rocks.
river2.title: River 2

river3.description: A castaway on Strawberry Creek Island.
river3.title: River 3

river4.description: Wherever Felix goes, Milo must follow.
river4.title: River 4

soccer1.description: The field was perfect for a game of family soccer.
soccer1.title: Soccer 1

soccer3.description: Watch out! Felix makes a dash for it!
soccer3.title: Soccer 3

soccer4.description: ... and Milo makes a suprise sneak attack...
soccer4.title: Soccer 4

description:
Lucie turned 33 this week.

Felix's taste in books is changing. He likes more complex stories that have some word play, and less pictures. Tonight we read Winnie the Pooh.

Milo is kinder with books. He no longer destroys pull-up books. He has also learned that some toys require a gentle touch. Yay!
title: February 26
